name: LongActingReversibleContraceptiveLARCICD10PCSProcedures
title: Long Acting Reversible Contraceptive (LARC) ICD10PCS Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of long-acting reversible contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Data Element Scope: Long-acting reversible contraceptive methods (i.e., contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems)),(Inclusion Criteria: Long-acting reversible contraceptive methods (i.e., contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems)),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-reversible (i.e., sterilization), moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, ring, diaphragm), and less effective (i.e., male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods))
